/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, teeming with life and activity. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the urban landscape. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in different hues, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Cars of various sizes and colors are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy nature of the city. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the towering height of the buildings and gives a sense of being enveloped by the cityscape.
